tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflict_resolution_activities (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT,
  stakeholder_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE resolution_progress (
  resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id UUID REFERENCES conflict_resolution_cases(case_id),
  stakeholder_id UUID REFERENCES stakeholders(stakeholder_id),
  progress_status TEXT,
  progress_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE conflict_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_name VARCHAR(255),
  case_description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
  stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
  stakeholder_role VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_type VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  stakeholder_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  progress_status VARCHAR(255));

CREATE TABLE conflict_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    case_description TEXT,
    case_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'OPEN',
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
    stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    stakeholder_role VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE resolution_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    activity_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'IN PROGRESS',
    case_id INT,
    stakeholder_id INT
);
